title: What Route Will You Take? Workshop

yaml.pagetitle: What route will you take? Workshop

markdown.headingText: What Route Will You Take? Workshop
markdown.markdown:
EPID 684 Spatial Epidemiology 3/31/2022

Jon Zelner `jzelner@umich.edu` [`epibayes.io`](https://epibayes.io)

![](../images/epid_logo.png){.absolute bottom=0 right=50 width="400" height="100"} ## Agenda - Spend ~10m digesting feedback from your partner(s) - ~20m discussion of each project - ~10m end-of-class debrief - Preview of next time ## Instructions for the workshop 1. Read through the [document](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FPm0Tfysp5gJ3UlXzv7nxLFGHmzg8SIa26x2hxY5gtg/edit#gid=0) shared with you by your partner. - If you have questions about their feedback, make a comment in the document. 2. In groups: - Decide who will go first and have that person do a brief overview of their feedback. - Discuss the feedback, being sure to take notes either in the review document or another one. - Switch, rinse, repeat # Next Time ## {background-iframe="https://publish.obsidian.md/epibayes/Courses/EPID684/modules/Module+4/4.+Applications+of+the+multi-level+approach+to+spatial+health+data" background-interactive=true}
